text: Nabii Yuusuf tooboko: usuk (binyaamiin kinnuk) garqo abek, toysa nummah kaak duma kay toobokoyti Yuusuf garqo abeh suge iyyen, tokkel Nabii Yuusuf keenik yoobbe maxco isi nafsih addal qellissi heeh : isin umaanet xagtan numuk umaanceh gacak raqtan iyye isi nafsih addal tet qellisak, Yalli isin dirab kee ererik (almumma) weelossaanam yaaxigeh
